summary: Email correspondence regarding the need for signed copies of a search warrant application and the warrant itself for US Virgin Islands (USVI) to obtain a warrant for devices. The email includes attachments of the documents.

events.title: Request for USVI Search Warrant Documents
events.description: An email was sent requesting final signed copies of the USVI search warrant application and the warrant itself to proceed with obtaining a warrant for devices.

events.title: Provision of Signed Search Warrant Documents
events.description: Signed copies of the USVI search warrant application and the warrant were attached and sent via email in response to the previous request.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated September 4-5, 2019, concerning a search warrant in the US Virgin Islands.
The correspondence indicates a need for signed copies of a search warrant application and the warrant itself to obtain a warrant for devices.
Attachments include 'LSJ_SW.pdf' and 'LSJ_SW_application.pdf', which are the signed copies of the warrant and its application.
